item.title: From the Recipezaar E-mail Bag
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Your (or whoever's) website is full of misspelled words and bad grammar. For starters "zaar" is spelled either "czar" or "tzar" but never "zaar". Just a friendly suggestion that you have someone proofread what goes on your website, preferably someone whose spelling and grammar knowledge you can trust. It is much more professional that way. For starters, did you really think we misspelled our LOGO? Do your friends ever call you "Mo", Maureen? I've been laughing at this one all day....
